alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 7:33PM CST until February 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW WILL RESULT IN HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS TONIGHT... .A fast moving storm system will sweep across the region tonight. Snow over north central and central Wisconsin will quickly spread east across the rest of the area late this evening. Snowfall rates will be moderate to heavy at times for a couple hours during the evening, then will diminish to light snow, freezing drizzle or drizzle after midnight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow tapering off to light snow and freezing drizzle after midnight. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Light ice accumulations possible overnight. * WHERE...Marathon, Lincoln and Oneida Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Wisconsin can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
